total.description: The total number of location items. Deprecated.

totalResults.description: The total number of location items.

offset.description: Index of the first location item to return.

limit.description: The number of location items to return.

property.description: The property by which to sort the list of location items.  The default is locationId.

hours.description: The store opening hours. Only applicable to location type 'store'.

distance.description: A session-scoped property that contains the distance when searching for location items. Not applicable.

address3.description: The third address field of the location.

endDate.description: The end date for the location. This is used when performing a search for inventory available from a store during a specific date range. If the search contains a specific date range, only locations that have a date that are contained within that date range will be displayed.

address2.description: The second address field of the location.

address1.description: The first address field of the location.

postalCode.description: The postal code of the location.

sites.description: List of sites.  A location can be constrained to a list of sites. If no site is defined, the location is available on all sites.

id.description: The site ID associated with this location.

type.description: The type of location, either 'location' or 'store'.

externalLocationId.description: An optional additional location ID, such as the merchant store ID. Use this if you have extra parameters for identifying your stores or locations.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the location.

siteGroups.description: List of site groups. A location can be constrained to a list of site groups. If no site group is defined, the location is available on all sites.

id.description: The site group ID associated with this location.

locationId.description: The ID of the location. This ID will be generated if none is provided.

repositoryId.description: The ID of the location repository item.

faxNumber.description: The fax number of the location.

startDate.description: The start date for the location. This is used when performing a search for inventory available from a store during a specific date range. If the search contains a specific date range, only locations that have a date that are contained within that date range will be displayed.

email.description: The email address of the location.
